#summary Meal Planner Edit Activity.

= Introduction =

Add or edit a meal that you plan to make.


= Details =

Use the Meal Planner Edit activity to pick a recipe from your [RecipeList recipe list] and plan to make a number of serves. A [ShoppingList shopping list] is automatically generated using the ingredients used to make the [RecipeEdit recipe] and what is currently in the [Inventory cupboard].

== Screen Fields ==
|| *Field* || *Description* ||
|| Recipe || The recipe that you will make ||
|| Serves || The number of people to make the recipe for ||

== Menu Options ==
|| *Menu Option* || *Description* ||
|| Discard || Discard any changes made ||
